divs: sighting detailsas i went outside and wanted to try out my digital camera...for just the reason of picking out infrared light \ i'm into robots\electronics "for infrared light shows up on digital film."i figured i would try it with ufo's and "bingo!!!" i've got ufo's for every time of the month.like a landing strip around here!!!i looked straight up in the neighbors yard.and took the picture...i couldn't see anything there; but i could sense something or someone watching me?...i got great pics and can read the hyroglifs (symbols)on the bottom of the ship, above me about 30-40 ft. up over top of the tree above me...later the object looked like a star, but more twinkly soto speak.i'm the guy with the film of a wormhole opening up and closing in the same frame..if i hadn't set my camera for 6500 exposure on my film..i wouldn't have got it.check the pictures out!!!i also have pics of ufo in the distance (500 ft. or higher)on the 3rd of december when i had to buy another camera..bluescreen error..malfunction..it was also in the area close to the moon in the other pic of the same photo.i work for olan mills photography...these photo's haven't been doctored up in any way!!what u see is what u get.. i say grab a cheap digital...you wont regret it!!!keep looking into the skies!!!........... " * * *" "*"
Summary: A sphere "O" with a light ring around the edges-underside of the ship/Hyrogliffs on underside of ship visible and signs of communication with me??/ pics also of a 4 sphered UFO all moving together as one ship.Twinkling as no others.
